body:
@achalshah20 yes i tried everything. cold reboot. hard reboot, updates ...
Output of nvidia-smi:
![unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18403881/40040579-1a11e3a2-581b-11e8-94f0-972d5b98a6a7.PNG)

I found a website where they told to install `nvidia-modprobe`. Didnt fix my problem.
I Found another website where they said the set the gpu with `os.environ`, didnt work either.
